org.ros.android.view.visualization.layer

Class CameraControlLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.android.view.visualization.layer.DefaultLayer
      • org.ros.android.view.visualization.layer.CameraControlLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layer, OpenGlDrawable

    public class CameraControlLayer
extends DefaultLayer
    Provides gesture control of the camera for translate, rotate, and zoom.

      • CameraControlLayer

        public CameraControlLayer(Context context,
                  java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
        Creates a new CameraControlLayer.

        The camera's frame will be set to frame once when this layer is started and always when the camera is translated.

        Parameters:
        context - the application's Context
        executorService -
